bollards.title: Bollards
bollards.description: Create inviting and safe environments with our diverse range of bollards. Designed to serve as both visual and physical barriers, our bollards also add architectural flair and additional features – such as functional lighting – to landscapes.

ductile iron.title: Ductile Iron Bollards
ductile iron.description: Bollards made from ductile iron, a material that is strong and durable, and can be cast into a variety of shapes and sizes. Ductile iron is a type of cast iron that is made from iron and carbon, and is known for its strength and durability.

products.name: Bollard / Cover Fluted
products.description: Decorative fluted bollard, line of three installed in front of building.

products.name: Bollard / Cover Non-Fluted
products.description: Non-fluted, long row guarding a building.

hardscape.title: Hardscape
hardscape.description: Explore high-quality hardscape products designed to excel in urban and industrial environments. Crafted from durable cast iron, these products are built to withstand harsh conditions with minimal maintenance.

detectableWarningPlates.title: Detectable Warning Plates
detectableWarningPlates.description: Reliance Foundry's detectable warning plates enhance pedestrian safety by providing tactile surface indicators that guide visually impaired individuals. These plates mark transitions between sidewalks and streets, improving accessibility for all. Made from raw cast iron, they develop a rich red-brown patina that offers excellent visual contrast while ensuring long-term durability.

treeGrates.title: Tree Grates
treeGrates.description: Reliance Foundry's tree grates protect trees and their root systems from urban wear and tear while enhancing the aesthetic appeal of streetscapes. The grates allow air, water, and light to reach tree roots, supporting healthy growth. Designed to meet ADA standards, these cast iron grates provide a smooth, safe walking surface that eliminates tripping hazards for pedestrians.

trenchGrates.title: Trench Grates
trenchGrates.description: Reliance Foundry's trench grates deliver effective water management for a variety of settings, from pedestrian walkways to industrial facilities. These cast iron grates prevent flooding in areas such as parking lots, driveways, and warehouses by rapidly draining excess water. With their raw finish, they form a protective patina that resists corrosion while blending seamlessly with architectural designs.

railway.title: Locomotive / Railway Castings
railway.description: Indian Railways, one of the world's largest rail networks, transports over 8 billion passengers and more than 1 billion tons of freight annually. Since 2022, Allied Iron Products has proudly partnered with Indian Railways as a trusted supplier. As a leading manufacturer of railway castings in India, we produce a variety of components, including cast iron brake blocks and counter weights. We offer a diverse range of high-quality, durable railway castings at competitive prices.

specifications.materialGrade: Cast Iron Grade as per Railway Standards
Cast Iron Grade as per Railway Standards
